channel.title: Project Marcbob
channel.description:
-My goal is to make a great economy server based on 718 Matrix and host it - Lot's of Bosses, skilling, minigames, and great pking. The pking that came with the source already is pretty amazing so I am not going to touch that. Some skills need some work and some minigames also do. I also plan on adding more bosses and dungeons.
-This server is going to be something I am going to learn off. No more taking short cuts and doing other random bullshit, I am going to learn. I'm not going to rush the progress.
[b]The home[/b] - Edgeville - Why? I want a lot of pking on the server. That is almost what I am basing it off. Edge is a great home for active pking. I am always open to changing it, however.
[b]The Shops[/b] - Spread around home and I plan to put a couple at the doantor zone that will give them some kind of an advantage.
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2ebzber.png[/img]
[b]The skilling[/b] - Every skill except farming is currently trainable. I took a shortcut with construction and did something very basic for a temporary solution. The rate of training is very fair for skilling and insanely fast for construction
[b]PvM[/b] - Currently there are a good amount of bosses and dungeons, but there could be more. I am adding more and more every day for new sources of money and good items.
[b]Minigames[/b] - Pretty much the only minigames done are the ones that came with the source. I need to work on that so there is more to do.
[b]PvP[/b] - As I mentioned already it is nearly perfect which is great because one of the focuses of this server is going to be pking.
[b]What makes me a good owner?[/b] I have been running servers for a very long time now (just look at how long i've been at MoparScape even) and I know what it takes to run and successful server and make players. This time I am even more dedicated because I want to get the server done right and I don't care how long it will take.
[b]Positions I need[/b] - This is the first server where I am actually going to have picked out my developers and staff members before hand. Obviously there will always be in-game promotions but I want to start with a couple people. - I need 1-2 server developers, 1 website developer, and 1-3 moderators or server support. - If you want one of these positions feel free to post in this topic. Pretty much just make up you own application. Include whatever you feel is necessary.
I guess I can add more pictures later for those who need pictures :P
I am really trying to be successful in this server. I am going to run the server for like a "beta" period to find what needs to be done in order to make gameplay, money making, bossing, skilling, and whatever else more smooth. In that time all the donations will build up and hopefully we will be able to buy a MoparScape sponsored spot and get a lot of players that way but I want to have a decent community before then.
[i]Just did lazy man construction to give people something to train[/i] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/mr7o1.png[/img]

item.title: Project Marcbob
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Applying for: Server Support
Skype: Sk8r_Mopar (My personal one is not to be posted on the forums, if you’d like it; I’ll pm it.)
Name: Jesse W.
Age: 17
Dedicated: Definitley, it’ll give me a lot more to do than just play real RuneScape (Which has gotten beyond boring)
Time Available: I’d say a good 8 hours each day. Give or take 1 hour.
Reason for Applying for this Position: I’ve seen your past work, and I believe this server can get somewhere. I’ll be multi-tasking (If accepted) on being a server support for you, and writing code for my project (I’m rather good at multi-tasking. It’s my life :P). I’ve also been known to rule with an iron fist, but not like a full on dictator, I listen, am respectful, and playful. I also can give you loads of ideas to add (I’d have to see what you got first.)
Anything else you want to know? Feel free to ask me.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Marcbob
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You said you’re open to changing the home. I’ve got a simple suggestion for you:
Why not make the users log in a neutral location on first login, from there, they would pick a hope. Edgeville for PK, or something like Cammy for Economy/Skill based home.
Then have something like ::homeswitch, if they ever decide to use the opposite.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Marcbob
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“Jmood, post:8, topic:477346”]owner or else.

Good luck with this, but isn’t that source highly unreliable. :P[/quote]
Far better than some 317 servers I used.

Soulcist:

Interesting Marc! I didn’t know you were still into this sort of stuff, good luck!

Thank you! Trying to get some interest back with RSPS. I’m hoping this will give me something to do and satisfy me being able to be in charge again.

[quote=“chains424, post:10, topic:477346”]I’d love to team up with you on this.
I’ll apply for Moderator/Server Support.

Application:

Skype: aaron.skinner4 Name: Aaron Skinner Age: 17 Dedicated: Yes I'll be dedicated. Time Available: I can be on most days except Sunday and Wednesday because those are church days. Reason for Applying for this Position: I somehow enjoy moderating. I enjoy helping people so I can help with questions that people may ask. I can moderate on the forums and in-game! I'd love to help enforce rules and help players enjoy their stay on your server.

I can also beta-test/post bugs that I may find in game.
I’d love to help make your server run as smooth in-game and/or on the forums as possible.

I know that some people that “Server Support” are lazy and do not do their job correctly.
Well you have my word that I will enforce the rules and I will help others that need it.

Edit: The reason I am not applying for the programming positions is because I’m too new towards coding to even attempt coding a 718 source.
And I don’t website develop much. Sorry mate. I wish I could help you with those, but the most I can do is enforce your rules and do whatever needed that Server Support needs to do.[/quote]

Thank you for the application! I will keep it in mind

Read full topic
